member.name: T:BinaryConverter.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:BinaryConverter.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:BinaryConverter.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:BinaryConverter.My.Resources.Resources.help_file
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to this executable accepts piped part numbers from another executable and/or arguments
the arguments are as follow:
this_exe.exe argument this_exe.exe -file filename
parameters accepted are:
argument the argument that need to receive will return argument and appended info like this example: argument appendedinfo
-file filename will read a part number on each line of the file and will return the original part number with its barcode example: -file part_numbers.txt will retur [rest of string was truncated]";.
